Description: The root element; can be a single unit or an array (batch).
An invocation of a method that expects a response.
A request that does not require and must not receive a response.
The output returned by the server upon successful execution.
The output returned by the server when a call fails.
The mandatory version key. Value must be "2.0".
A string containing the name of the remote method.
A container for the method arguments (Array or Object).
An identifier used to correlate request/response pairs.
The value returned on success. Mutually exclusive with error.
An object containing error details. Mutually exclusive with result.
An integer error code (e.g. -32601 for Method Not Found).
A concise, human-readable summary of the error.
Optional primitive or structured data about the error.
An array containing one or more Request/Notification objects.
